title: I can't install LoL Please Help

embed.description: Years of conversation fill a ton of digital pages, and we've kept all of it accessible to browse or copy over. Whether you're looking for reveal articles for older champions, or the first time that Rammus rolled into an "OK" thread, or anything in between, you can find it here.

body: This is a website that seemed to solve my problem of installing LoL. But is is only for NA and EU. I need an Oceania one please. Btw it is C:\Users\user\AppData\Roaming\Riot Games\League of Legends 3.0.0\install\disk1.cab. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it. Please help me fiz this problem!!!

replies.body: That post is really old and no longer relevant.  What is the specific issue that you're having?  What are you trying to do and what's going wrong?  Are there any error messages, and what do they say?  Let me know!
im having issues instaliing the game it just says  C:\Users\user\AppData\Roaming\Riot Games\League of Legends 3.0.0\install\disk1.cab. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it.

Thanks for the update!  This sounds like your PC is blocking some game files from being scanned or updated.  As a first step, go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your operating system is allowing your game files to be accessed.  That should get you fixed up!
